name: Latig0sx
body:
### Usage

**1) Checking your System Configuration**

    $ sudo ./latigo-check -u <user>

**2) Hardening your System**

    $ sudo ./latigo-hardening -u <user>


### Features

    Checking System Hardware
    Checking Global System Settings
    Checking System Preferences
    Checking Accounts
    Checking Network Services
    System Hardening


### Screenshots

![Check](http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/9882/auditing.png)
![Hardening](http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/9039/hardening.png)
